stories.title: Mercury: The Final Century Class Ship
stories.intended_reader: Cruise enthusiasts interested in fleet history
stories.markdown:
**Three ships defined an era. Mercury was the conclusion.**

[Celebrity Mercury](/ships/celebrity-cruises/celebrity-mercury.html) launched in 1997 as Century Class's final ship. Two years of lessons from Century and Galaxy informed every decision. Mercury represented the class at its most refined.

The same design philosophy. The same culinary commitment. The same premium standards. But with refinements only experience could provide. Mercury was what the class became when Celebrity knew exactly what worked.

She sailed nearly two decades as the class's senior member. The ship that showed Century Class could endure and improve.

**The truth:** Mercury represented Century Class completed. The final answer to questions Century first asked.

Those who sailed Mercury remember her as the class's graduate. The ship that showed what excellence could become.

stories.title: Mercury's Caribbean Excellence
stories.intended_reader: Former passengers remembering Mercury's Caribbean sailings
stories.core_insight: Mercury's Caribbean deployments created loyal following
stories.markdown:
**Mercury worked Caribbean waters with particular excellence.**

[Celebrity Mercury](/ships/celebrity-cruises/celebrity-mercury.html) became synonymous with premium Caribbean cruising. The intimate Century Class size felt right for island ports. The service standards elevated familiar destinations.

St. Maarten from Mercury's deck. Cozumel through Mercury's shore excursions. Refined ship meeting familiar destinations.

'Mercury makes Caribbean feel new,' passengers observed.

'Mercury makes Caribbean feel premium,' the experienced replied.

**The truth:** Mercury's Caribbean deployments proved Century Class suited the region. Her departure left a gap in premium Caribbean options.

Those who sailed Mercury through Caribbean remember the elevation. The ship that made familiar feel fresh.

stories.title: Mercury's Transition to TUI
stories.core_insight: Mercury's departure completed Century Class's exit from Celebrity
stories.markdown:
**When Mercury left, Century Class fully departed Celebrity.**

[Celebrity Mercury](/ships/celebrity-cruises/celebrity-mercury.html) became Mein Schiff 2 for TUI Cruises. The final Century Class ship left Celebrity's fleet. An era that began with Century in 1995 ended completely.

Those final voyages drew passengers who understood what was ending. Not just a shipâ€”an entire generation of Celebrity identity.

'This is really goodbye to Century Class,' one passenger observed.

'This is really goodbye to where we started,' another replied.

**The truth:** Mercury's departure closed the Century Class chapter. All three ships sail on under different names. But the Celebrity Century Class exists only in memory now.

Those who loved Mercury remember the finality. The last ship of the generation that started it all.
